about_the_game:
About the game.

This is a indie game created by a developer who loves TRPGs and the Cthulhu mythos.
Set in 1920s Arkham, you play as a private investigator trying to solve a mysterious case.
The game uses TRPG-style character creation, dice rolling, and a "keyword" system to give the game an authentic feel.
and a "keyword" system, you'll be able to enjoy an authentic detective game.
Currently in development, the game is expected to be released sometime in 2023.

Interact: E / F
